title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Update
description: Gather and document the updated project scope, objectives, and requirements for the bioelectronic medical device platform. Ensure to involve relevant stakeholders, such as medical professionals, regulatory bodies, end-users, and subject matter experts in bioelectronics and neural interfaces. Prioritize consideration of factors like safety, security, usability, scalability, regulatory compliance, data privacy, and ethical considerations. Incorporate feedback from the approved RFC and update the project requirements based on criticality and risk assessment. Upon completion, review with the Project Manager for final approval.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, and data flows for the bioelectronic medical device platform.

title: Develop Backend Systems
description: Implement the backend systems, including data processing, device communication, and integration with other systems.

title: Develop Frontend User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the bioelectronic medical device platform.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management systems for the bioelectronic medical device platform.

title: Establish Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards for medical devices.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the bioelectronic medical device platform.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Strategies
description: Define and implement testing and quality assurance strategies for the bioelectronic medical device platform.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the bioelectronic medical device platform.
